title: Inside the Mind of the Troll
subtitle: Using Machine Learning to Understand Russian Disinformation
featured_image_alt: JSON tweets collected about the midterms.
featured_image_caption: Shown above are JSON-encoded data of Tweets related to the 2018 midterm elections in the United States.
description: We've released an interactive machine learning model that helps make the Russian disinformation campaign just slightly more accessible. Given any English Tweet, our model determines whether that Tweet uses language specifically popular among Russian trollsâ€”or whether the Tweet more closely resembles organic content.
